name: Memories (itch) (YaroslavtsevNick)
description:
You are immersed in the memory of a mercenary who goes on a dangerous mission to steal secret data.

Controls:

"Middle Mouse Button With Moving Mouse" to rotate camera

"Scrolling mouse wheel" to change camera distance

"WASD" to move

"SHIFT" to sprint

"C" to crouch

"Space" to jump

"F" to interact. Neutralize enemies, hack devices (with hovering the mouse cursor), open / close doors, pickup items

"TAB" to open tablet

"M" (in the tablet) to switch between drone and player
